projects.name: Fanikauppa App
projects.description: An online store built with React and Node.js, featuring product listings, a shopping cart, and user authentication.

projects.name: Gigs Info App
projects.description: A web application that provides information about upcoming gigs and events, allowing users to browse and search for events by location and date. Also, there is a user authentication system that allows users to post own events and rate others.

projects.name: 4Langs App
projects.description: A mobile application that helps children to learn four languages at a time through interactive lessons and quizzes.
features: Games and interactive exercises with words

projects.name: Chill Bins App
projects.description: An application for the utility company which sends notifications to users about fullness of bins.
responsibilities: Developed bins list with building-based filtering
Worked on notification logic for bin fullness
Integrated backend API with mobile frontend
features: Bins list with filter by buildings
User can mark bins as full or empty

projects.name: Varauskalanteri App
projects.description: An application which helps users to book and manage reservations in a computer class.
responsibilities: Implemented database and backend logic for booking management
Developed booking form and calendar UI

projects.name: Ensitietoa Website
projects.description: A website which provides information about health care courses.
projects.context: Client project completed during professional practice

projects.name: Avaruuden Sankari
projects.description: A simple 2D space shooter game where players control a spaceship to defeat enemies and avoid obstacles.
features: User can control a spaceship using keyboard
User can shoot lasers to defeat enemies and lose health when colliding with them
User can get score points by defeating enemies

projects.name: Haunted House
projects.description: A 3D game for 6-8 years old children where players navigate through a haunted house.
features: User can pick a character (a boy or a girl)
User can defeat ghosts by throwing light balls at them and lose health when colliding with them
User can collect coins, diamonds and inventory items
3D environment and characters from Unity assets store and modeled in Blender
